package.name: Services_ReCaptcha
package.summary: PHP5 interface to the reCATCHA and the reCATCHA Mailhide API
package.description:
Services_ReCaptcha is a PHP5 interface to the two services offered by recaptcha: reCAPTCHA and reCAPTCHA Mailhide.
reCAPTCHA is a freely available CAPTCHA implementation. It distinguishes humans from computers. To use reCAPTCHA, you will need a public/private API key pair, available here: http://recaptcha.net/api/getkey
reCAPTCHA Mailhide helps you protect your inbox by asking people to solve a reCAPTCHA before they can view your email address. The reCAPTCHA can only be solved by humans, so this stops spammers from gaining access to your email address through automated programs. reCAPTCHA Mailhide requires the mcrypt php extension and you will also need a public and a private API key, that can be generated here: http://mailhide.recaptcha.net/apikey

* Added support for the new "custom_translations" reCAPTCHA option (+ tests), * Comments cleanup.
* All setters now return the current instance to allow chaining of set calls, * Some fixes to follow new PEAR coding standards.
